text:
Hi everyone! :boom:

A small, prospective client of mine in South Africa wants a site developed, and wants to see a price option for a HubSpot site using the SprocketRocket theme.

I'll give more information in a DM, but essentially it's an MVP 9 page site.

*I'm looking for a freelance HubSpot developer who meets the following criteria (not just for this client, but for other work in the pipeline as well in future).*

1. *Fluent in English*
2. *Ideally South Africa based (or with a similar time zone and dollar exchange rate)*
3. *Very familiar with SprocketRocket theme*
4. *Can give me an hours estimation this week (considering that some more information will be shared)*
The site pages are as follows, and the amount of content provided by client is light, and they will write more with my guidance (I will of course share more detailed info once we're in touch)

• Home
• Solutions and Services
• Industries
• Resources
• Clients
• About us
• Contact us
• *Resources (like a blog listing page just with file links)*
